division.name: Arms Vertebral column
division.group: Axioappendicular muscles, Posterior axioappendicular muscles, Extrinsic shoulder muscles

element.name: Latissimus dorsi muscle, roots
element.action: pulls the forelimb dorsally and caudally

element.name: Latissimus dorsi muscle, scapular
element.action: pulls the forelimb dorsally and caudally

element.name: Trapezius muscle
element.action: Descending (superior) part elevates; ascending (inferior) part depresses; and middle part (or all parts together) retracts scapula; descending and ascending parts act together to rotate glenoid cavity superiorly

element.name: Levator scapulae muscle, roots
element.action: Elevates scapula and tilts its glenoid cavity inferiorly by rotating scapula

element.name: Levator scapulae muscle, scapular
element.action: Elevates scapula and tilts its glenoid cavity inferiorly by rotating scapula

element.name: Levator claviculae muscle
element.nervelist: C1-C4, upper cervical ventral spinal roots

element.name: Rhomboid major muscle, roots
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Rhomboid major muscle, scapular
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Rhomboid minor muscle, roots
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Rhomboid minor muscle, scapular
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Pectoralis major muscle, lateral
element.action: Clavicular head: flexes the humerus. Sternocostal head: extends the humerus. As a whole, adducts and medially rotates the humerus. It also draws the scapula anteriorly and inferiorly

element.name: Pectoralis major muscle, medial
element.action: Clavicular head: flexes the humerus. Sternocostal head: extends the humerus. As a whole, adducts and medially rotates the humerus. It also draws the scapula anteriorly and inferiorly

element.name: Pectoralis minor muscle, lateral
element.action: stabilizes the scapula by drawing it inferiorly and anteriorly against the thoracic wall

element.name: Pectoralis minor muscle, medial
element.action: stabilizes the scapula by drawing it inferiorly and anteriorly against the thoracic wall

element.name: Serratus anterior muscle
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Sternalis muscle
element.action: protract and stabilize scapula, assists in upward rotation

element.name: Infraspinatus muscle
element.action: Lateral rotation of arm & Adduction of arm and stabilizes humerus

element.name: Supraspinatus muscle
element.action: abduction of arm and stabilizes humerus

element.name: Teres minor muscle, lower
element.action: laterally rotates and adducts the arm

element.name: Teres minor muscle, upper
element.action: laterally rotates and adducts the arm

element.name: Triceps brachii muscle, radial
element.nerve: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches
element.action: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder

element.name: Triceps brachii muscle, axillary
element.nerve: axillary nerve, motor branch to triceps brachii
element.action: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder

element.name: Anconeus muscle
element.action: partly blended in with the triceps, which it assists in extension of the forearm. Stabilises the elbow and abducts the ulna during pronation

element.name: Pronator teres muscle
element.nerve: median nerve, superficial muscles in foream

element.name: Flexor carpi radialis muscle
element.nerve: median nerve, superficial muscles in hand

element.name: Palmaris longus muscle
element.nerve: median nerve, superficial muscles in hand

element.name: Flexor digitorum superficialis muscle
element.nerve: median nerve, intermediate muscles of foream
element.action: flexor of fingers (primarily at proximal interphalangeal joints)

element.name: Pronator quadratus muscle
element.nerve: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, deep muscles of forearm

element.name: Flexor digitorum profundus muscle, interosseous
element.nerve: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, hand

element.name: Flexor pollicis longus muscle
element.nerve: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, hand

element.name: Extensor carpi radialis brevis muscle
element.nerve: radial nerve, deep branch before supinator
element.action: extensor at the wrist joint, abducts the hand at the wrist

element.name: Extensor carpi radialis longus muscle
element.nerve: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches
element.action: extensor and abductor of the hand at the wrist joint

element.name: Extensor carpi ulnaris muscle
element.action: extends the little finger at all joints

element.name: Supinator muscle, radial
element.nerve: radial nerve, deep branch before supinator

element.name: Extensor pollicis brevis muscle
element.action: extension of thumb at metacarpophalangeal joint

element.name: Extensor pollicis longus muscle
element.action: extension of the thumb (metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal)

element.name: Adductor pollicis muscle
element.nerve: ulnar nerve, adductor pollicis and lumbrical
element.action: adducts the thumb at the carpometacarpal joint

element.name: Abductor digiti minimi muscle of hand
Opponens digiti minimi muscle
element.action: draws 5th metacarpal anteriorly and rotates it, bringing little finger (5th digit) into opposition with thumb

element.name: Lumbricals of the hand muscles, median
element.action: flex metacarpophalangeal joints, extend interphalangeal joints

element.name: Lumbricals of the hand muscles, ulnar
element.nerve: ulnar nerve, adductor pollicis and lumbrical
element.action: flex metacarpophalangeal joints, extend interphalangeal joints

element.name: Dorsal interossei muscles of the hand
